Frozen 2 is an English movie starring Idina Menzel, Kristen Bell and Jonathan Groff in prominent roles. It is an animated fantasy drama directed by Chris Buck and Jennifer Lee.
Dil Bechara is a Hindi movie starring Sushant Singh Rajput and Sanjana Sanghi in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Mukesh Chhabra.
Romeo Akbar Walter (RAW) is a spy thriller that is set against the backdrop of the Indo-Pakistani War of 1971. The film, which is inspired by true events, is directed by Robby Grewal.

We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes  a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson`s (Angel) case, by shouting out one word - SHAZAM! This streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult Super Hero Shazam (Levi), courtesy of an ancient wizard.  Still, a kid at heart-inside a ripped, godlike body-Shazam revels in this adult version of himself by doing what any teen would do with superpowers: have fun with them!  Can he fly?  Does he have X-ray vision? Can he shoot lightning out of his hands? Can he skip his social studies test? Shazam sets out to test the limits of his abilities with the joyful recklessness of a child.  But he`ll need to master these powers quickly in order to fight the deadly forces of evil controlled by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

Set in the 19th century, Kesari recounts the story of Havildar Ishar SIngh who played a key role in the 1897 Battle of Saragarhi, in which an army of 21 Sikhs fought against a legion of Afghans in what is considered as one of the greatest last-stands in military history.

From Disney and visionary director Tim Burton, the all-new grand live-action adventure "Dumbo" expands on the beloved classic story where differences are celebrated, family is cherished and dreams take flight. Circus owner Max Medici (Danny DeVito) enlists former star Holt Farrier (Colin Farrell) and his children Milly (Nico Parker) and Joe (Finley Hobbins) to care for a newborn elephant whose oversized ears make him a laughingstock in an already struggling circus. But when they discover that Dumbo can fly, the circus makes an incredible comeback, attracting persuasive entrepreneur V.A. Vandevere (Michael Keaton), who recruits the peculiar pachyderm for his newest, larger-than-life entertainment venture, Dreamland.

A young dynamic entrepreneur finds herself in a locked hotel room next to the body of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her, and over the course of one evening, they work together to find out what actually happened.
On returning to the beloved elephant reserve once managed by his father, a young man encounters and takes on an international racket of poachers.

In God`s own country, the supreme leader of the ruling party dies, leaving a huge vacuum, not only in the electoral and leadership sphere of the party but also that of the state. In the inevitable succession squabble and the power struggle that ensues, the thin line that separates good and bad becomes irrecoverably blurred and out of this seemingly endless mayhem, emerge forces that are hitherto unheard of.

This film is the inspiring saga of a man, a politician, a leader and a visionary - the Prime Minister of India, Narendra Damodar Das Modi. It chronicles his 64 - year epic journey, from abject poverty, selling tea on a railway station as a chaiwala (tea seller) to becoming the Leader of the world`s largest democracy. The film "PM Narendra Modi" is the shining symbol of the victory of a common man.

Aditya Parikh and his father Bipin Chandra Parikh begin to explore the meaning of life as they meet a stranger traveler named Ketki, who takes them on a journey of surprises and realizations that strengthens their bond with every situation that tests their drifting relationship.

column1: How To Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
column5: What began as an unlikely friendship between an adolescent Viking and a fearsome Night Fury dragon has become an epic trilogy spanning their lives. In this next chapter, Hiccup and Toothless will finally discover their true destinies: the village chief as ruler of Berk alongside Astrid, and the dragon as leader of his own kind. As both ascend, the darkest threat they've yet faced-as well as the appearance of a female Night Fury-will test the bonds of their relationship like never before.

Guddu, the star reporter of a local news channel in Mathura, falls for Rashmi, a feisty young woman. The couple decides to try a live-in relationship, but what happens when their old-fashioned family members decide to pry into their lives?

Set in the 1990s, Marvel Studios` "Captain Marvel" is an all-new adventure from a previously unseen period in the history of the Marvel Cinematic Universe that follows the journey of Carol Danvers as she becomes one of the universe`s most powerful heroes. While a galactic war between two alien races reaches Earth, Danvers finds herself and a small cadre of allies at the center of the maelstrom.

In the late 1990s, journalist Manav Banerjee moves to Orissa along with his pregnant wife hoping to start fresh and chasing the promise of a lucrative career. As an undercover reporter for a newspaper, he sets to find out whether there is any truth to the rumours that Australian missionary Graham Staines is illegally proselytizing leprosy patients.

The unfulfilled dream of a cricket career and a failed romance leaves a youngster disillusioned and puts a strain on his family life. Despite the support and encouragement of his newlywed wife, he fails to appreciate the blessings in his life. Will it be too late before he realises his mistakes?

Two siblings hailing from a wrestling family get the golden opportunity to try out for the WWE, but only one of them would make it. Both their talent and relationship will be put to the test as they set out to chase their wildest dreams.
Marvel movie marathon is a continuous 20 hours event; where we will be screening 9 Marvel movies (including Avengers : End Game) back to back at select cinemas.

The lives of three men sharing the same name intertwine, leading to a series of hilarious incidents. Directed by Nadirshah, Mere Naam Shaji stars Asif Ali, Biju Menon and Baiju Santhosh in the lead roles.

On a visit to her beach-side childhood home along with her husband and two children, Adelaide Wilson finds herself haunted by traumatic events from her past, which are aggravated by certain eerie incidents in the house. Amidst her rising paranoia, new threats emerge from the darkness in the form of masked intruders, who appear to be her family`s doppelgangers.

A group of rejected future ghosts takes shelter in a refugee camp. Marginalized by their shrinking habitat in the real world, they conjecture whether they should find a place in the virtual world or cyberspace for their survival. However, they find a very novel solution to their existential crisis at the end.
The film revolves around a man who suffers from a rare condition called congenital insensitivity to pain. Using it to his advantage, he

A retired barrister and his wife are about to celebrate their 50th wedding anniversary, with their children and family members arriving from various parts of the world to make the occasion memorable. As all of them gather under one roof, unresolved issues from their shared past resurface, leading to unforeseen consequences.

Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge is a story about human relationships.Chaudhry Baldev Singh (Amrish Puri) is a London based immigrant. He, along with his wife Lajwanti (Farida Jalal) and two daughters Simran (Kajol) and Chutki (Pooja Ruparel) have been living in London for the past several years. A true Indian at heart, Chaudhry Baldev Singh is a man of great morals and has tried to imbibe the very same in his daughters. Simran like any other girl dreams of this perfect man and waits for him to walk into her life. Raj Malhotra (Shah Rukh Khan), another London based immigrant is a regular rich spoilt brat brought up in the lap of luxury. How the two strangers meet, fall in love and get hitched is what the movie is all about.

A hidden loot of 500 million rupees sends a bunch of eccentric folks on a madcap misadventure, where they all vie to get their hands on the money. Among these are a bickering couple, two dim-witted siblings, some seasoned conmen, a greedy police officer and the mastermind of the loot itself. Will any of them actually hit the jackpot at the end of it all?

Noor, a teenage British Kashmiri, arrives in Kashmir on a quest to retrace her roots and find her long-lost father. She`s aided in this search by a local boy named Majid, who is smitten by her. However, things take a dark turn after the two stumble upon a dark secret that puts Majid`s life in danger. Can love ever be the same again for these youngsters?

Superstition is still very much prevalent in many villages in India and is used to put women down. In an attempt to taint her character and squash her journey to success, she is often labeled as a witch or worse. This label is then endorsed with make-believe stories that gather momentum as they are shared. SAAVAT is one such journey of a woman, who overcomes her personal anguish to deliver justice to another woman trapped in an unspeakable story of deceit and deception.

A biographical drama that recounts the life of Anandibai Joshi, who studied medicine at the Woman's Medical College in Pennsylvania in the late 19th century and went on to become one of the first female physicians in India.

Based on the graphic novels by Mike Mignola, the film follows Hellboy - the beloved son of the Fallen One who is caught between the worlds of the supernatural and human. This time around, his formidable enemy is an ancient sorceress bent on revenge.

22-year-old Murad is the son of a driver, hailing from a ghetto in Mumbai. While his parents expect him to land a white collar job, the youngster`s greatest passion is rap music. In a country where being an artist is often a far-fetched dream for the impoverished, Murad`s struggles to rise above his circumstances and become a musician will send ripples of hip-hop across all social classes, inspiring an entire generation of youngsters.
Uriyadi 2 is a Tamil movie starring Vijay Kumar and Sudhakar in prominent roles. It is an action thriller directed by Vijay Kumar.

The lives of several characters hailing from different backgrounds pivot unpredictably on a series of interconnected incidents on a fateful day. Directed by Thiagarajan Kumararaja, Super Deluxe stars Vijay Sethupathi, Fahadh Faasil, Samantha Ruth Prabhu and Mysskin in central roles.

An ex-army officer Kabir (Zaheer Iqbal) comes back to Kashmir to be a school teacher. However, things turn out to be totally opposite of what he had imagined. The school is situated in the middle of the remote Wuller lake, lacking basic amenities like running water and electricity and is attended by just a handful of students. This is not what Kabir had signed up for.
An action comedy which revolves around the lives of people in the slums of Chennai, Kuppathu Raja stars GV Prakash and R. Parthiban in central roles, and is directed by Baba Bhaskar.

A corrupt politician schemes to usurp land from the farmers under the guise of development and use them to advance his personal agenda. The only person standing between him and his devious plan is a local civilian who is a bit of a rebel.

Stella and Will, two teenagers with life-threatening illnesses, meet at a hospital and strike an instant connection. Will their ailments come in the way of their budding relationship? Based on the eponymous novel by Rachael Lippincott, the film stars Haley Lu Richardson and Cole Sprouse in the lead roles.
Wonder Park tells the story of a magnificent amusement park where the imagination of a wildly creative girl named June comes alive.

A hapless young girl becomes the target of a vengeful killer on the loose. The only person standing between the killer and the girl is a visually challenged man who has vowed to protect her at any cost.

Menka Urvashi is the story and picturisation of Marathi Culture in Rural Maharashtra over a period in between 1955 to 1975. Tukaram Patil, the rich and powerful baron of the village, is obsessed with power and driven by self-interst. Circumstances put him at odds with a poor farmer named Dhanaji, and he plots a devious scheme to bring Dhanaji down. As Patil`s tyranny continues, destiny intervenes in the form of a lavani dancer named Ambika, who takes it upon herself to make sure that justice is served. This movie is the first directorial effort of Matchindra Chate, who is the well known personality in Maharashtra in Education field.

Set in the pre-partition era, Yaara Ve tells the story of three friends who are thick as thieves, and what happens when a woman enters their lives. Directed by Rakesh Mehta, the film stars, Gagan Kokri, Yuvraj Hans, Raghveer Boli and Monica Gill in central roles.

An aspiring filmmaker from Mumbai reluctantly takes up the assignment of filming the wedding festivities in a small town in western Maharashtra. Once she gets there, she is drawn into the celebration, chaos and drama surrounding the family gathering. At the end of the crazy ride, both the big city filmmaker and the small town folks may have something to learn from each other.
Woh Ban Gaya Killer is a Hindi movie starring Dharmesh Makwana and Kajal Patel in prominent roles. It is an action romance thriller directed by Dinesh Makwana.
If you are a representative of the production house, please share the details of the film with [email protected]
Zhagaram is a Tamil movie starring Eden Kuriakosse and Nandha Durairaj in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Krish with Dharan Kumar as musician, forming part of the crew.

A real life account of the deadly Nipah virus outbreak in Kerala, and the courageous fight put on by several individuals which helped to contain the epidemic. Directed by Aashiq Abu, the film stars Kunchacko Boban, Parvathy, Indrajith Sukumaran, Asif Ali, Tovino Thomas and Rima Kallingal in pivotal roles.

As a student, Amit struggled to pass his school examinations and was afraid of competitions. However, with the help of his parents, he manages to become a primary teacher, and decides to help children carve a better future for themselves. For his first job, Amit gets posted to a government school, which is in a very bad condition and is illegally opened as a private school by the head of the village, much to the dismay of the school headmaster, Dinanath.

The story of an innocent man and his ambitious wife, who struggle with the pressure of childbirth right after their arranged marriage. Marudhar Express deals with all the problems a couple faces post an arranged marriage, in a hilarious way.

In Paharganj, the dark underbelly of Delhi, an investigation into a gruesome murder leads two officers into unravelling a series of interconnected events involving a host of people with stories of their own.

column1: Albert Pinto Ko Gussa Kyun Aata Hai?
column5: A remake of the 1980s eponymous film, it is a take on anger and helplessness of the common man. When Albert leaves his house one morning without telling anyone his whereabouts, his girlfriend Stella files a complaint with the police and when he doesn`t return after days, she begins to worry.

The Tashkent Files is a gripping thriller that revolves around the mysterious death of India's 2nd Prime Minister Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri and attempts to uncover if he had actually died a natural death, or, as alleged, was assassinated.

column1: Betiyon Ki Balle Balle (Kargil Se Kanyakumari)
column5: A social drama that delves into the pertinent issue of woman empowerment, Betiyon Ki Balle Balle is directed by Manoj Nathwani and stars Jeet Upendra, Firoz Irani and Shruti in key roles.

Ek Haqiqat Ganga is a Hindi movie starring Raza Murad, Ritesh Bora and Pramod Moutho in prominent roles. It is a drama directed & written by Ritesh Bora with Milan Harish as musician, forming part of the crew.

The story of Gun Pe Done revolves around a new year`s eve party thrown by a bootlegging kingpin. Bootlegger Manik Singh and his gang want an item girl for the party which will be attended by his political cronies. However, Raziya, the dancer and her boyfriend Pancham are not too keen to entertain the hooch mafia.

Louis and his wife Rachel relocate from Boston to rural Maine along with their two kids, where they come to know about the sinister pet sematary in the neighbourhood. After the death of their pet cat, Louis buries it in the sematary, which starts off a chain of horrific events and unleashes an unstoppable evil.

An edge-of-the-seat thriller that celebrates an astounding human feat, the documentary chronicles free soloist climber Alex Honnold`s preparations leading up to achieving his lifelong dream: climbing the face of the renowned El Capitan`s one-kilometre vertical rock face at Yosemite National park...without a rope!
Gangs Of Madras is a Tamil movie starring Daniel Balaji, Kalaiarasan Harikrishnan and Bagavathi Perumal in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by C.V. Kumar.

Events take a bizarre turn when a man, just a day away from his engagement with his girlfriend, is threatened by the local goon to stop his engagement if he fails to settle his debt with him. Will he be able to repay his debts and get engaged to his beloved?
Rocky The Revenge is a Tamil movie starring Srikanth, Eshanya Maheshwari and Nassar in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by KC Bokadia.

Based on the graphic novels by Mike Mignola, the film follows Hellboy - the beloved son of the Fallen One who is caught between the worlds of the supernatural and human. This time around, his formidable enemy is an ancient sorceress bent on revenge.

Down on luck and depressed by constant failures in personal and professional life, Vijay is desperately in search of that single stroke of fortune that could turn his life around. But what if the power to rewrite his destiny lies within?

In God`s own country, the supreme leader of the ruling party dies, leaving a huge vacuum, not only in the electoral and leadership sphere of the party but also that of the state. In the inevitable succession squabble and the power struggle that ensues, the thin line that separates good and bad becomes irrecoverably blurred and out of this seemingly endless mayhem, emerge forces that are hitherto unheard of.

Hridayi Vasant Phultana is a Marathi movie starring Prathamesh Parab and Ritika Shrotri in prominent roles. The movie also stars Abhijit Amkar and Pranali Bhalerao. It is a drama directed by Milind Kavade.

Sunder Shinde makes a living as the sales representative for a spices company, and is the sole breadwinner in his family. He is hardworking yet underappreciated, and the pressure of his unrewarding job eventually takes a toll on his health. Will he be able to cope with this setback?

Two friends embark on an auto rickshaw ride in the night, which soon takes an unexpected turn with a series of surprises awaiting them. A psychological thriller directed by Rakesh Adiga, the film stars Bharath, Shruti Goradia and Akshay Pavar in central roles.
Two Bangalore cops investigate an old case which puts their wit, resolve and morals to the test. Will they be able to solve it?

In an isolated hospital in the high ranges of Kerala, an autistic patient with special skills piques the interest of a psychiatrist, whose investigation into her past leads to startling revelations. Directed by debutant Vivek, Athiran is a gripping thriller which stars Fahadh Faasil and Sai Pallavi in central roles.
When an illegal hooch baron`s reign of terror troubles an entire village, the people turn to the only man who can save them: Raja, the flamboyant don with a heart of gold.

The second installment in the Manje Bistre series revolves around Sukhi`s journey to Canada to attend his cousin`s marriage ceremony. The traditional big fat Punjabi wedding brings together an entire family full of amusing characters, while Sukhi falls in love with an Indo-Canadian named Rano. Packed with double the laughter and double the fun and frolic, the film stars Gippy Grewal in the lead role.

The story of Vinci Da is about an obsessed make-up artiste, who has been struggling to make his own place in the industry, solely based on his talent and capabilities. Despite his father being a renowned make-up artiste, he could not follow his footsteps. His career took a further dip when his straightforwardness and arrogance resulted in him insulting three big personalities of the industry. However, his life changes forever after the entry of a well-wisher.

A profound examination of life, death, hope and immortality, Tarikh gives us a peep into the inner worlds and beliefs of three people: Anirban an idealist, Ira a conformist and Rudrangshu a realist; all of whom are bound by friendship. Directed by Churni Ganguly, the film stars Raima Sen, Saswata Chatterjee, Ritwick Chakraborty and Kaushik Ganguly in central roles

Raja, a law student, falls for the daughter of Shivram, a powerful local figure with whom he has had issues in the past. Is there a happy ending for the young couple or will Shivram stand between them?

Happily married and settled in Paris along with her husband and five-month-old baby, Lajja had it all until the day her world turned upside down. After her husband and child go missing, she is drawn into a strange labyrinth of deceit, with all evidence pointing to her marital life being a lie. As the line between truth and lie is blurred and even bloodied by a brutal murder, the young woman`s life spirals out of control.
Set in 1945, in Pre-Independence India, Kalank is a tale of eternal love.

Hoping to take a short break from the humdrum routine of work and familial responsibilities, five friends embark on a road trip from Bangalore to Goa. But life has charted out its own unexpected course for these men, as the fun trip becomes a life-changing journey.

column1: The Curse Of The Weeping Woman
column5: When the lives of her children are endangered by an evil spirit, a single mother seeks the help of a priest to escape a tragic fate. Set in Los Angeles in the 1970s, the horror thriller brings alive the Latin American legend of La Llorona, who is believed to stalk the night and prey on children.
A physician discovers that he can talk to animals.

Based on the bestselling novel of the same name by Anna Todd, After tells the story of a young woman who falls for a guy with a dark secret, and what happens in the course of their tumultuous relationship.

The fourth installment in the Muni film series has the popular ghost hunter (played by Raghava Lawrence) returning to fight the evil forces: both supernatural and earthly. Written and directed by Raghava, the film also stars Vedhika, Oviya and Nikki Tamboli.

What if Veerappan came back from the dead in the guise of an IPS officer? The plot revolves around a celebrity couple Mrs Lilitha and Harman Shergill who are serving as an IAS and IPS officers respectively. Shockingly, the wife kills the husband in a felicitation function in the presence of VIPs. Will she be proven guilty in court?

Luck hasn't always been in favour of Arjun, a gifted cricketer in his mid-thirties whose career has failed to take off. With everyone around him insisting that he should give up on his career, will Arjun have the courage of conviction to continue pursuing his dream?

Miranda House is a Marathi movie starring Milind Gunaji and Pallavi Subhash in prominent roles. It is a drama drama directed by Rajendra Talak with Suraj Kurade as cinematographer, forming part of the crew.
Shivarudraiah is haunted by a series of nightmares in which he sees his daughter Namana, a daring journalist die of an accident.

The film revolves around a guy who is very passionate about music. As time passes, his passion for music becomes stronger and he decides to pursue his dream by going to Bangalore for one year. He seeks permission from his father who does not seem to be too convinced with the idea of his son making a career in music. Will a young dream perish due to a father-son clash of interests?
Punarvasu Nakshathra Mithuna Rashi is a Kannada movie starring Vijay Karthik in a prominent role. It is a drama directed by Vijay Karthik.

Howla Howla delves into the life of a second year PUC student who is a big fan of legendary Kannada star Dr. Vishnuvardhan. The events that unfold in her academic and personal life during this period forms the crux of the story. Directed by Somnath Patil, the film stars Arathi Kulkarni, Hanumantha Gowda and Amith in pivotal roles.
Naukar Vahuti Da is a Punjabi movie starring Binnu Dhillon, Kulraj Randhawa and Upasna Singh in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Smeep Kang.
Diksoochi is a Telugu movie starring Dilip Kumar Salvadi, Chatrapati Shekar, Sammeta Gandhi and Chandni Bhagwanani, in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Dilip Kumar Salvadi.
Oru Yamandan Prema Kadha is a Malayalam movie starring Dulquer Salmaan in a prominent role. It is a drama directed by BC Noufal.

The grave course of events set in motion by Thanos that wiped out half the universe and fractured the Avengers ranks compels the remaining Avengers to take one final stand in Marvel Studios` grand conclusion to twenty-two films, "Avengers: Endgame."

KaaGaR is a Marathi movie starring Rinku Rajguru and Shashank Shende in prominent roles. The movie also stars Shantanu Gangane. It is a drama directed by Makrand Mane.If you are a representative of the production house, please share the details of the film with [email protected]

Three stories are woven together by a series of interconnected events in this suspense thriller. Directed by Santosh Kumar Batageri, the film stars Santhosh, Nayana Sai, Century Gowda and Michael Madhu in pivotal roles.

Inspired by the R.K. Narayan story "An Astrologer`s Day", Gara revolves around the life of a conman with a dark past who poses as an astrologer to make a living. Directed by K.R. Muralikrishna, Rahman Hassan, Pradeep Aryan, Avanthika Mohan, Johnny Lever and Sadhu Kokila in central roles.

Set in pre-independent India, Nadhoo Khan follows the story of Chanan, who aspires to become a wrestler despite his physical limitations. His grandfather agrees to coach him under one condition: that he stay away from women and focus solely on his training. Things take an interesting turn when Chanan falls for a girl, and is subsequently pitted against her brother in a wrestling competition.

Nandini, an aspiring medical student, has fallen head over heels for Abir, who is a part-time farmer, martial arts teacher and a well-beloved figure in the community. But will Abir ever reciprocate Nandini`s feelings for him?

On receiving the news of his father`s death, Indrajith, a famous superstar of Bengali cinema, rushes back to the hometown he left behind a long while back. As long-buried memories resurface, his introspections set him on a journey of self-discovery.
Mr. Local is a Tamil movie starring Sivakarthikeyan, Nayanthara and Radhika Sarathkumar in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Rajesh.M.

When he is wrongly convicted for swindling banks with fake certificates, an investigative journalist sets out to prove his innocence and take down the dangerous counterfeiting racket behind the crime. Directed by T.N. Santhosh, Arjun Suravaram stars Nikhil Siddharth and Lavanya Tripathi in central roles.

Vijayaratha is a suspense thriller which follows a guy on a race against time to save a life, even as the world around him starts falling apart. Directed by Ajay Surya, the film stars Vasanth Kalyan and Arpitha Gowda in central roles.
Setters is a Hindi movie starring Aftab Shivdasani, Shreyas Talpade and Sonnalli Seygall, in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Ashwini Chaudhary, forming part of the crew.
Blank is a Hindi movie starring Sunny Deol and Karan Kapadia in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Behzad Khambata, forming part of the crew.
Hansa Ek Sanyog is a Hindi movie starring Akhilendra Mishra and Sharat Saxena in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Santosh Kashyap and Dhiraj Verma.
Sharmili, a girl from Lucknow is all set to be married when, on the night of her wedding, she is kidnapped by a goon Bhaiyaji who asks for Rs 5 crore as ransom.

Far off in the land of UglyVille lives the UglyDolls, who are far from perfect yet totally awesome. This is the story of these free-spirited dolls, as they confront what it means to be different, struggle with a desire to be loved, and ultimately discover who you truly are is what matters most.

Balaa is a Marathi movie starring Upendra Limaye, Kranti Redkar, Vikram Gokhale and Suhasini Mulay in prominent roles. It is a drama directed & written by Sachindra Sharma with Rakesh Singh as producer, forming part of the crew.

Set in Punjab in 1970s, Blackia tells the story of Gama, who is born into a family of gold smugglers and eventually forced into this world of crime against his wishes. On realising that he is just a puppet in the hands of certain anti-national forces, Gama decides to redeem himself by standing up against these evil forces.
Jind Jaan is a Punjabi movie starring Rajvir Jawanda, Sara Sharma and Jaswinder Bhalla in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Darshan Bagga.
Maharshi is a Telugu movie starring Mahesh Babu in a prominent role. It is a drama directed by Vamshi Paidipally.
The second installment in the campus-drama series Student of The Year (2012), Student Of The Year 2 is a Hindi movie featuring Tiger Shroff, Ananya Pandey and Tara Sutaria in the prominent roles.

Stronger than ever, our favourite little superhero Bheem and his friends are visiting the kingdom of China to participate in an annual martial arts competition. But when the country`s princess is kidnapped by an evil part-demon named Zuhu, Bheem decides to go after him and end Zuhu`s reign of terror.

The story begins when ace private eye  Harry Goodman goes mysteriously missing, prompting his 21-year-old son Tim to find out what happened.  Aiding in the investigation is Harry's former Pokemon partner, Detective Pikachu: a hilariously  wise-cracking, adorable super-sleuth who is a puzzlement even to himself.Finding that they are uniquely equipped to communicate with  one  another, Tim and Pikachu join forces on a thrilling  adventure  to  unravel  the  tangled mystery. Chasing clues together through the neon-lit streets of Ryme City-a sprawling, modern metropolis where humans and Pokemon live side by side in a hyper-realistic live-action world - they encountera diverse cast of  Pokemon  characters  and  uncover  a  shocking  plot  that  could destroy this peaceful co-existence and threaten the whole Pokemon universe.
What if a child from another world crash-landed on Earth, but instead of becoming a hero to mankind, he proved to be something far more sinister?
Ayogya is a Tamil movie starring Vishal Krishna Reddy and Raashi Khanna in prominent role. It is a drama directed by Venkat Mohan.

In a village plagued by water scarcity, an illegal racket of profiteers divert the government water tankers. With the help of a news reporter, the villagers decide to take on the racket and put an end to the injustice.
Anushka is a Kannada movie starring Rupesh Shetty and Amrutha in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Devaraj Kumar.
Lukan Michi is a Punjabi movie starring Karamjit Anmol  and Mandy Takhar in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by M. Hundal.

Sona da with Abir and Jhinuk embarks on his new adventure, a quest that will take them to the legendary Durgeshgor. The journey reveals that the Debroy family, the erstwhile zamindars in their princely mansion hold the key to a presumed rumor of a treasure connected with Plassey. With an amazing vibrant backdrop of Durga Puja in the princely Debroy mansion where the trio is invited for the occasion, one after the other clues are revealed testing Sona da`s wit and grit one more time leading towards the discovery of one of greatest treasures Bengal has ever witnessed.

The lives of a group of individuals troubled by their personal and professional turmoils intersect, leading to unexpected consequences. The film, while addressing several contemporary issues, conveys an uplifting message about not giving up in the face of great adversity.

Luv Ranjan's De De Pyaar De is a contemporary rom-com with a quirky take on urban relationships. The film starring Ajay Devgn, Tabu and Rakul Preet Singh is directed by the renowned Hindi film editor, Akiv Ali.
The Hustle is an English movie starring Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Chris Addison.

column1: The Sun Is Also A Star
column5: "What if I told you I could get you to fall in love with me...?"
In the third installment of the John Wick series, John must fight his way out of New York after a $14 million global contract is put out on his life following his killing of a High Table member.
A Dogs Journey is an English movie starring Betty Gilpin, Dennis Quaid and Josh Gad in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Gail Mancuso with Robert Komatsu as editor, forming part of the crew.
Adham is a Marathi movie starring Santosh Juvekar and 	Gauri Nalawade in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Abhishek Kelkar.
Rampaat is a Marathi movie directed by Ravi Jadhav.
Gangstar vs State is a Punjabi movie starring Mantej Mann, Sunakshi Sharma and Amrit Randhaw in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Alam Gahir.
Chaturnath is an everyman who is fed up with the corruption in the society. Wanting to make a change for the better, he dons the lawyer`s gown and soon becomes the messiah of the downtrodden.
Mental Hai Kya is a Hindi movie starring Kangana Ranaut and Rajkummar Rao in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Prakash Kovelamudi with Ekta Kapoor as producer, forming part of the crew.
The film follows a group of intelligence officers who embark on a top secret mission to track down a wanted international criminal.

A thrilling and vibrant live-action adaptation of Disney's animated classic, "Aladdin" is the exciting tale of the charming street rat Aladdin, the courageous and self-determined Princess Jasmine and the Genie who may be the key to their future.

More than two decades after Clifford McBride went missing while on a mission in search of extraterrestrial intelligence, his son and Army Corps engineer Roy McBride sets out on a galactic quest to find him.

Based on Nila Satyanarayan`s novel `Runn`, the story revolves around a maniac IAS officer, who tortures his wife with the disappointment upon having two girl children and no son. Tragedy befalls when the woman is found dead while she undergoes an illegal fetus test in her third pregnancy. She is survived by her father and two daughters, one of which grows up to become an advocate and gets the case reopened to fight for justice for her mother.  Will Justice prevail?

Muklawa is a Punjabi movie starring Ammy Virk and Sonam Bajwa in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Simerjit Singh with Gunbir Singh Sidhu and Manmord Sidhu as producers, forming part of the crew.

Following the global success of "Godzilla" and "Kong: Skull Island" comes the next chapter in Warner Bros. Pictures' and Legendary Pictures' cinematic Monster Verse: "Godzilla: King of the Monsters, "an epic action-adventure that pits Godzilla against some of the most popular monsters in pop culture history.
An intimate portrait of the life and times of English musician Elton John, from his early years at the Royal Academy of Music to his ascension as a legendary artist and cultural icon.
MA is an English movie starring Missi Pyle, Luke Evans and Juliette Lewis in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Tate Taylor with Jason Blum as producer, forming part of the crew.
Dear Comrade is a Telugu movie starring Vijay Deverakonda in a prominent role. It is an action drama directed by Bharat Kamma.

Nandha Gopalan Kumaran (NGK), a charismatic young man, embarks on a political journey that brings about an unprecedented socio-political revolution. Directed by ace filmmaker K. Selvaraghavan, NGK stars Suriya Sivakumar in the titular role.
BaBo is a Marathi drama directed by Ramesh Chaudhary, with Sachin Baburao Pawar & Trupti Sachin Pawar as the producer, forming part of the crew.

When he was eight years old, Bharat made a promise to his father: to keep the family together no matter what. It`s a promise he keeps over the next 60 years of his life, despite each decade throwing a new set of challenges at him: some humorous, some thrilling and a few even dangerous!

After the events of X-Men: Apocalypse, the X-Men are national heroes, known for tackling several risky missions. On one such mission Jean Grey is hit by the deadly radiation of a solar flare. She attains her maximum power and becomes the Phoenix. But before long Jean gains powers that corrupt her to the core and turns into the Dark Phoenix. The X-Men have little time to decide if the life of a teammate, a woman they cherish, is worth more than the existence of the entire world and its people.
A man and woman hailing from two different parts of India are united owing to their mistrust, suspicion, and hate for each other.
Mogra Phulaalaa is a Marathi movie starring Swwapnil Joshi and Neena Kulkarni in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Shrabani Deodhar.

Woody has always been confident about his place in the world and that his priority is taking care of his kid, whether that's Andy or Bonnie. But when Bonnie adds a reluctant new toy called "Forky" to her room, a road trip adventure alongside old and new friends will show Woody how big the world can be for a toy.
A brilliant yet impulsive young surgeon falls into a path of self-destruction after the love of his life is forced to marry another man.
Shadaa is a Punjabi movie starring Diljit Dosanjh and Neeru Bajwa in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Jagdeep Sidhu.
Drive is a Hindi movie starring Sushant Singh Rajput and Jacqueline Fernandes in prominent roles. It is an action-thriller adventure directed by Tarun Mansukhani.

Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren keep a possessed doll locked up in an artifacts room in their house. When the doll awakens the room's evil spirits, it soon becomes a night of terror for the couple's young daughter and her friends.
Takatak is a Marathi movie starring Prathamesh Parab, Ritika Shrotri, Abhijit Amkar and Pranali Bhalerao in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Milind Kavde.
Mindo Taseeldarni is a Punjabi movie starring Kavita Kaushik in a prominent role. It is a drama directed by Avtar Singh.
Satellite Shankar is a Hindi movie starring Sooraj Pancholi in a prominent role. It is a drama directed by Irfan Kamal.

After the events of the untitled Avengers film Peter Parker and his friends go on summer vacation to Europe and there Peter finds himself trying to save his friends against a villain known as Mysterio.

Based on groom kidnappings in Bihar, where the groom is kidnapped to avoid dowry, the film has Siddharth Malhotra playing a thug who helps kidnap grooms. It also features Parineeti Chopra in a prominent role.
Jai Mummy Di is a light-hearted family comedy revolving around two mothers and their kids. What follows is how these kids deal with their mommy issues, which leads to utter chaos.

column1: A Biopic from the Film Industry
column5: A simple girl from Punjab comes to the big city with dreams in her eyes. The plot revolves around her struggle to stardom and how she handles her success once she reaches the top.

Over three decades after the action drama Top Gun released in 1986, Tom Cruise reprises his role of Pete "Maverick" Mitchell in the second installment of the Top Gun series - Top Gun: Maverick in 2019 written by Peter Craig.
Arjun Patiala is a Hindi movie starring Diljith Dosanth and Kriti Sanon in prominent roles. It is a comedy drama produced by Dinesh Vijan.
"The Lion King" journeys to the African savanna where a future king must overcome betrayal and tragedy to assume his rightful place on Pride Rock.

Pal Pal Dil Ke Paas is a Hindi movie starring Karan Deol in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Sunny Deol.If you are a representative of the production house, please share the details of the film with [email protected]
Smile Please is a Marathi movie starring Mukta Barve and Lalit Prabhakar in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Vikram Phadnis.

Anand Kumar, a Mathematics genius from a modest family in Bihar who is made to believe that only a King's son can become a king is on a mission to prove that even the poor man can create some of the world's most genius minds. He starts a training program named 'Super 30' to help 30 IIT aspirants crack the entrance test and make them highly successful professionals.
A spinoff of the Fate of the Furious, focusing on Johnson's US Diplomatic Security Agent Luke Hobbs forming an unlikely alliance with Statham's Deckard Shaw.

column1: Once Upon A Time In Hollywood
column5: The film tells the story of a TV actor and his stunt double who embark on a journey to make a name for themselves in 1969 Hollywood, during the Charles Manson murders.
If you are a representative of the production house, please share the details of the film with [email protected]
After five young mutants who are held in a remote secret facility discover their abilities, they embark on a journey to save themselves.

column1: Dora And The Lost City Of Gold
column5: Though she has spent most of her life exploring the jungle and embracing adventures, nothing could have prepared Dora for the crazy world of high school. Along with a ragtag group of teens and her trusted sidekick Boots the Monkey, she embarks on an epic quest to rediscover a lost Incan civilization, while also trying to save her parents from impending trouble.

Disney's "Artemis Fowl," based on the beloved book by Eoin Colfer, is a fantastical, spellbinding adventure that follows the journey of 12-year-old genius Artemis Fowl, a descendant of a long line of criminal masterminds, as he seeks to find his father who has mysteriously disappeared. With the help of his loyal protector Butler, Artemis sets out to find him, and in doing so uncovers an ancient, underground civilization-the amazingly advanced world of fairies. Deducing that his father's disappearance is somehow connected to the secretive, reclusive fairy world, cunning Artemis concocts a dangerous plan so dangerous that he ultimately finds himself in a perilous war of wits with the all powerful fairies.
Based on the 2008 Delhi Batla House case, the crime thriller Batla House chronicles the police encounter and investigation of the case.

A struggling Gujarati businessman heads to China in a quest for better prospects. Will his eventful journey full of ups and downs and misadventures eventually help him become a  successful entrepreneur?

Saaho is a multi-lingual movie starring Prabhas and Shraddha Kapoor in prominent roles. The cast also includes Neil Nitin Mukesh and Jackie Shroff. It is a drama directed by Sujeeth with Shankar Mahadevan, Ehsaan Noorani and Loy Mendonsa as the music composers, forming part of the crew.
Ye Re Ye Re Paisa 2 is a Marathi movie directed by Hemant Dhome, with Hrishikesh Koli as the writer, forming a part of the crew.
Chhichhore is a Hindi movie starring Sushant Singh Rajput and Shraddha Kapoor in prominent roles. The movie also stars Varun Sharma. It is a drama directed by Nitesh Tiwari.
Good News is a Hindi movie starring Akshay Kumar, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Diljit Dosanjh and Kaira Advani in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Raj Mehta, forming part of the crew.

Evil resurfaces in Derry as director Andy Muschietti reunites the Losers Club-young and adult-in a return to where it all began with "IT CHAPTER TWO." The film is Muschietti's follow-up to 2017's critically acclaimed and massive worldwide box office hit "IT," which grossed over $700 million globally.  Both redefining and transcending the genre, "IT" became part of the cultural zeitgeist as well as the highest-grossing horror film of all time. Because every 27 years evil revisits the town of Derry, Maine, "IT CHAPTER TWO" brings the characters-who've long since gone their separate ways-back together as adults, nearly three decades after the events of the first film.
Dream Girl is a Hindi movie starring Ayushmann Khurrana and Nushrat Bharuchain prominent roles. It is a drama written & directed by Raaj Shaandilyaa.

Spies In Disguise is an English movie starring Will Smith and Tom Holland in prominent roles. It is an animated action adventure directed by Nick Bruno with Peter Chernin as producer, forming part of the crew.
Daaka is a Punjabi movie starring  Gippy Grewal and Zareen Khan in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Baljit Singh Deo.
Nikka Zaildar 3 is a Punjabi movie starring Ammy Virk, Wamiqa Gabbi, Sonia Kour, Nirmal Rishi and Baninderjit Bunny in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Simerjit Singh.
Abominable is an English movie starring Tsai Chin in prominent roles. It is a aniimation directed by Jill Culton, with Rupert Gregson-Williams as musician, forming part of the crew.
Doorbeen is a Punjabi movie starring Wamiqa Gabbi, Yograj Singh and Karamjit Anmol in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Ishan Chopra.
Gaalib  is a Marathi movie starring Deepika Chikhalia and Anil Rastogi in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Manoj Giri.

Rambo is a Hindi movie starring Tiger Shroff and Hrithik Roshan in prominent roles. It is an action drama directed by Siddarth Anand.If you are a representative of the production house, please share the details of the film with [email protected]
Marjaavaan is a Hindi movie starring Riteish Deshmukh, Sidharth Malhotra and Tara Sutaria in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by  Milap Milan Zaveri.
Henry Brogan, an elite assassin, is suddenly targeted and pursued by a mysterious young operative that seemingly can predict his every move.

The film revolves around a woman who has been living alone in New York City. Drinking wine, watching movies and spying on her neighbors are her favourite pass times.  Meanwhile, a new family moves into the house across the way and she begins to spy on them. One day, while looking out of the window, she witnesses something that she shouldn't have. Will this change her life forever? Will danger befall on her? Will she be able to escape the situation?

A chilling origin story to one of the most iconic comic book supervillains, the film follows a failed stand-up comedian in the city of Gotham who is ostracized by the society and soon turns into a life of crime after being driven insane.
Password is a Bengali movie starring Dev Adhikari  and Paoli Dam in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Kamaleshwar Mukherjee.

Based on My Little Epiphanies, The Sky Is Pink chronicles the life of Aisha Chaudhary, who became an inspirational speaker after being diagnosed with pulmonary fibrosis when she was thirteen-years-old.
Based on Disneyland's theme park ride where a small riverboat takes a group of travelers through a jungle filled with dangerous animals and reptiles, but with a supernatural element.

The second installment of the epic fantasy adventure follows the ascendant princess Aurora and the darkly charismatic Maleficent as they try to navigate the complex dynamics between them, form new alliances and confront new adversaries - all in a bid to protect their land and its subjects.
